mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_s_province ( ProvinceID, ProvinceName, DateCreated, DateUpdated ) VALUES ( #{provinceId}, #{provinceName}, #{dateCreated}, #{dateUpdated} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbl_s_province
ProvinceName = #{provinceName},
DateCreated = #{dateCreated},
DateUpdated = #{dateUpdated},
WHERE ProvinceID = #{provinceId}

UPDATE tbl_s_province
ProvinceName = #{map.provinceName},
DateCreated = #{map.dateCreated},
DateUpdated = #{map.dateUpdated},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_s_province ( ProvinceID, ProvinceName, DateCreated, DateUpdated ) VALUES ( #{map.provinceId}, #{map.provinceName}, #{map.dateCreated}, #{map.dateUpdated} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_s_province
AND ProvinceID like CONCAT('%', #{provinceId} , '%')
AND ProvinceName like CONCAT('%', #{provinceName} , '%')
AND DateCreated like CONCAT('%', #{dateCreated} , '%')
AND DateUpdated like CONCAT('%', #{dateUpdated} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
